Description: Limestone model of a building with courtyard.
Curator's comments: Published: Von Babylon bis Jerusalem, Vienna 1999, p. 163 [281].
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1997 15 Jan-15 Jun, Spain, Barcelona, Centre de Cultura Contemporània de Barcelona, Architectural Models of Antiquity 1999 2 Feb-18 Jul, Germany, Mannheim, Reiss-Engelhorn-Museen, Von Babylon Bis Jerusalem: Die Welt der altorientalischen Konigsstadte
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
